00026 #ifndef _server_h_
00027 #define _server_h_
00028 
00029 #include <sys/stat.h>
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <fstream>
00032 #include <vector>
00033 
00034 class Server
00035 {
00036     public:
00037         Server();
00038         ~Server();
00039 
00040         class Player
00041         {
00042             public:
00043                 std::string GUID;
00044                 std::string number;
00045                 std::string nick;
00046                 std::string ip;
00047                 Player() : GUID(""), number(""), nick(""), ip("") {};
00048                 Player( std::string g, std::string nu, std::string ni, std::string i ) : GUID(g), number(nu), nick(ni), ip(i) {};
00049                 Player* clone() { return new Player( GUID, number, nick, ip ); };
00050         };
00051 
00052         //getters
00053         std::string name() const;
00054         std::string backupDir() const;
00055         std::string botLog() const;
00056         std::string configFile() const;
00057         std::string dbFolder() const;
00058         struct stat infos() const;
00059         std::string ip() const;
00060         int port() const;
00061         std::string rcon() const;
00062         std::streampos row() const;
00063         std::string serverLog() const;
00064         int strict() const;
00065         bool isChanged() const;
00066         bool isValid() const;
00067 
00068         //setters
00069         void setName( std::string name );
00070         void setBackupDir( std::string backupDir );
00071         void setBotLog( std::string botLog );
00072         void setConfigFile( std::string configFile );
00073         void setDbFolder( std::string dbFolder );
00074         void setInfos( struct stat infos );
00075         void setIP( std::string ip );
00076         void setPort( int port );
00077         void setRcon( std::string rcon );
00078         void setRow( std::streampos row );
00079         void setServerLog( std::string serverLog );
00080         void setStrict( int level = 1 );
00081         void setChanged( bool changed = true );
00082         void setValid( bool valid = true );
00083 
00084         //funzioni per l'accesso diretto all'array dei giocatori
00085         unsigned int size();
00086         Player* operator[] ( int pos );    //overloading dell'operatore [int]
00087         void push_back( Player* player );
00088         std::vector<Server::Player*>::iterator begin();
00089         void erase( std::vector<Server::Player*>::iterator iteratore );
00090         void clear();
00091 
00092         //confronto con le vecchie opzioni, ed in caso di modifiche critiche lo resetta, altrimenti ripristina i dati dinamici.
00093         void test_for_changes(Server* old);
00094         //controlla se sono state date impostate tutte le opzioni, true=ok.
00095         bool test_for_options();
00096         
00097         
00098         std::string toString();
00099 
00100   private:
00101         bool m_changed;
00102         bool m_valid;
00103         std::string m_name;
00104         std::string m_configFile;   //file di cfg del bot (quella relativa al singolo server, con rcon e file)
00105         struct stat m_infos;    //contiene le info del file di configurazione, tra cui la data dell'ultima modifica
00106         std::string m_rconpass;
00107         std::string m_ip;
00108         int m_port;
00109         std::string m_backup;
00110         std::string m_botLog;
00111         std::string m_serverLog;
00112         std::string m_dbFolder;
00113         std::streampos m_row;
00114         int m_strict;           //livello di restrizioni.
00115 
00116         std::vector<Player*> m_giocatori;
00117 };
00118 
00119 #endif
